title: Warm smoked lobster salad with radish, and a lime vanilla mango dressing
description: A rather smart salad. Smoked lobster, an interesting selection of salad leaves and a sweet, sharp fruity dressingFor this recipe you will need a smoke gun if you want to smoke the lobster meat.
ingredients: 40g/2½ oz yellow frisée lettuce (from the centre of the lettuce)
6 English radishes, finely sliced on a mandoline
